mapper.select: SELECT a.createdate AS "createDate", a.createby AS "createBy.name", CASE WHEN p.Name = 'sys' THEN '' ELSE p.Name END AS "peoplename", a.telstatus AS "telstatus", a.remark AS "remark", a.content AS "content" FROM t_mis_contant_record a LEFT JOIN t_mis_dunning_people p ON p.Id = a.dunningpeoplename WHERE a.ContantType = #{contanttype} and ContantTarget = #{contanttarget} and Dealcode = #{dealcode} ORDER BY a.createdate desc

SELECT CreateDate FROM `t_mis_dunned_conclusion` WHERE CreateDate <NOW() and CreateDate >#{dirDate} and isEffective='1' and dealcode=#{dealcode} and dunningpeopleId=#{dunningpeopleId} and dunningCycle=#{dunningCycle} LIMIT 1;
